textContent:
1.75oz (52.5ml) Bourbon
.5oz (15ml) Lemon Juice
.5oz (15ml) Honey
Top up (approx 2oz or 60ml) Hot Water
Lemon Wedge Garnish

Mix in glass
Garnish with Lemon twist or wedge
